Item.Text: Beast Token: Lowest numbered no printed Setup
Gaining Power Cards: Choose Minor or Major Power, draw 4 cards, keep one in hand, discard the rest. If a Major Power, forget one of your Power Cards (which can be the Major Power you just chose)
Invader Build: If Invaders present, add a City if Towns outnumber Cities on the land, otherwise add a Town
Invader Explore: Add an Explorer to a land if it is has a Town or City, or it is adjacent to a Town, City, or Ocean
Stage II Escalation: Effects happen as soon as the card is revealed, before Explore, unless stated otherwise
Repositioning Presence: Whenever you would add a Presence from your Presence Track, you can instead use one from anywhere on the island
Anytime you meet the current victory condition
Too Much Blight: If the last Blight comes off the Blight Card, follow the instructions there
A Spirit is Destroyed: If any Spirit has no Presence left on the island
Time Runs Out: If you need to draw an Invader Card (to Explore), but the Invader Deck is empty
